titles.title: American Workforce Act
American Workforce Act
A bill to establish a program of workforce development as an alternative to college for all, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
American Workforce Act
This bill establishes the American workforce program to provide subsidies to employers who enter contracts to provide on-the-job training to individuals with a high school diploma (or equivalent). The total subsidy per contract may not exceed $9,000.
